@@ -278,0 +278,8 @@
+        @Override
+        public void write(byte b[], int off, int len) throws IOException {
+            if ((off | len | (b.length - (len + off)) | (off + len)) < 0)
+                throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException();
+            out.write(b, off, len);
+        }
+
+        @Override
